Package angryflappybird

Class AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
      • angryflappybird.AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer
  • Enclosing class:
    AngryFlappyBird
    class AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer
extends javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
    Custom timer class that implements the behavior of the AngryFlappyBird application

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void birdCollapseEffect()
      Plays out the bird falling after a collision with pig or pipe
      void checkCollision()
      Checks if there is a collision between the blob and any obstacles (pig, floor, pipe) and sets the OBSTACLE_COLLISION and GAME_OVER flags accordingly
      private void checkEggCollection()
      Checks if there is a collision/collection b/w the pig(s) or blob/bird and an egg, and updates the score accordingly
      private void endScroll()
      Have all (moving) components of the game scene stop
      void handle​(long now)  
      private void moveBlob()
      (Step 2) Updates the blob/bird after some elapsed duration of time
      private void moveFloor()
      (Step 1) Updates the floor by placing them one after the other by setting their new positions and rendering them on the canvas
      private void movePipes()
      Updates the pipes after some elapsed duration of time, along with any egg(s) or pig(s) with them.
      private void showHitEffect()
      Creates + plays a parallel transition to show the effect when hitting an obstacle
